description: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
descriptionRaw: Draw 3, then reduce those cards' costs by 1.
flavorText:
PROGRESS DAY!
Celebrate at the PLAZA OF THE SUN GATES!
See HEXTECH WONDERS!
Gasp at the DARING PORO!
Hear the MAN OF TOMORROW speak on the STATE OF TODAY!
FREE entry! 
Piltovan children welcome!
name: Progress Day!
